programme.title: World Features
programme.desc: The show features the biggest entertainment and world news of the week. The news programme for audiences who want more depth to their daily coverage

programme.title: Dateline London
programme.desc: A look at national events that are taking place in UK. They report all the issues from around the globe. Each week, a panel of four leading journalists, lecturers, and commentators, discuss top news stories from an international perspective

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: As part of BBC World News' State of America season, Click looks to the future as they go behind the scenes at the world's first Virtual Reality Amusement park in Salt Lake City

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: As part of BBC World News' State of America season, Rajan Datar travels by train along America's southern border to investigate the country's long and complex history with Mexic
